snippet.title: Tactical Assassin (2005) - Gameplay [HD - 720p60]
snippet.description:
Before the Adobe Flash would have end-of-life (EOL) support by next year (2020), I decided correctly that I need to play some games by online to bring back my own childhood memories, before it's too late. Well, it's been 20 years since then (of Adobe Flash), remember my first gaming leisure last 9 or 10 years ago - month of December (That time I was still a child back then).

Since there are already videos for this original game called Tactical Assasin - made by Simon Hason Games (which can be found here - http://shdgames.com/), last December 2005 for almost 15 years, I decided to play this game for good, without any doubts.

However, if you not heard yet about that said "sad-but-moving-on" tech news about this, then please feel free to visit these important articles from the Web:


https://techcrunch.com/2017/07/25/get-ready-to-say-goodbye-to-flash-in-2020/

https://www.theverge.com/2017/7/25/16026236/adobe-flash-end-of-support-2020

https://billionaire365.com/2019/01/20/adobe-flash-player-available-to-download-with-new-improvements-for-windows-10/


And so, RIP my childhood (2009 - 2019/2020). I am even unsure, if the author would probably upgrade somehow to HTML5 support in the future for these old Flash games.


Here are the specs. of my PC:
TYPE: Gaming (All-In-One) Laptop
NAME: HP OMEN 
CPU: Intel Core i7-7700HQ @2.8GHz (Can overclock up to 3.8GHz)
GPU: Intel HD Graphics 630 + NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 
RAM: 16 GB DDR4 (2x 8 GB RAM installed)
OS: Windows 10 Home 64-Bit 
HDD: 1 TB + 256 GB SSD Installed (Samsung and ST)
Sound: Realtek HD Audio Driver

Programs used:
*Bandicam - Fully Registered version (Absolutely no watermarks found on this video!). I stopped using Apowersoft Online Screen Recorder for a while, for some unknown reasons.
*Played on Tyrone's Unblocked Games. Feel free to play now! - https://sites.google.com/site/tyronesgameshack/tactical-assassin

#TacticalAssassin
#AdobeFlash2019
